shortAddressRequired: Short address code is required for Saudi Arabia
invalidCompanyFormat: Company format is invalid for Saudi Arabia
bannerDescription: Based on new shipping regulations, please ensure you enter your National Address shortcode correctly to complete your order. This helps us deliver your shipment smoothly without delays.
errorMessage: The short address code format is incorrect. Please enter a valid code.
noAddressFound: No national address is associated with this shortcode. Please verify your code.
applyAddressError: We could not apply this address. Please try again or enter it manually.
validationError: Something went wrong while validating the shortcode. Please try again.
shortcodeNotInAddress: No national address is associated with this shortcode. Please verify your address.
